alert.note: Alert for Hickman (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 22 at 1:26PM CST until January 23 at 4:00AM CST by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Tennessee... Duck River At Centerville affecting Hickman County. For the Duck River...including Centerville...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Duck River At Centerville. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:00 PM CST Saturday the stage was 19.6 feet and falling. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 9.1 feet Thursday morning. - Action stage is 17.0 feet. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 400 AM CST.
